website_summaries.verdict: Harness with flexible buckle for easy loading also has 2 attachments for adding leash.
pros: Has mesh lining and spongy padding on chest and belly area
cons: Buckles could be hard to adjust, and size issues reported by some users

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: I have a french bull dog mix and needed a heavy duty harness. This is exactly what I was looking for. Easy to put on . I had bought other harnessss that fell apart. It also has a reflector on it so you can see in the dark. Even my dog likes it. He fetches for it when we are getting ready for a walk. Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: You should get this
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good product and great value. Well-constructed, feels sturdy but still lightweight enough for casual walks. Larger chest piece seems to make for a more comfortable walk. I have a 56 lb pitbull, for reference. It should, however, be noted that I measured my dog's chest and at 27 inches the sizing guide suggested a Large, which was too small, even at its largest. I exchanged for an X-Large, which she is barely big enough for. She wears it almost at its smallest. Maybe my dog is just a weird in-between size. If your dog has similar lean/athletic build with a deep-chest, I would size up.
customer_reviews.author: Luz

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: I had this harness for a little less than two months when my dog pulled and it fell apart. Not impressed with the quality of the sewing. If you sell something for big dogs, it should be made to hold up to what they can do. I'm past the return window- but figured I could at least write a review to warn others. ***edited to add on 3-9-20 the company has now offered me money 3 times to take this review down
customer_reviews.author: mom2graham

customer_reviews.title: I beleive $30.00 should buy a quality harness that you can trust for your friend.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my German Shepherd pup. Although it lasted for a few months, the plastic clip which attaches the harness broke without cause. I beleive the failure was a result of the cheap Chinese plastic in the poorly made clip.
customer_reviews.author: D. Pike

customer_reviews.title: Wrong advertising  XL size ??
customer_reviews.text: I have a Bloodhound who’s chest measures 39” Web sight says = XL is to be from 32” - 42” BUT inside label on harness shows XL - 32” - 37”????? Your XL doesn’t fit 39” size chest dog . Harness says it’s to goes up to 42”.
customer_reviews.author: skip

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us
customer_reviews.text: We have three dachshund so we orders three small harnesses.. Put them on, adjusted to fit and went on our usual 3+ mile daily walk which is the only time of the day they had these on. After three days my wife noticed all the dogs had developed raw (sore) spots on the inside of their front leg about the size of a quarter. Tried adjusting but they were still rubbing. Cant have that so we had to return them. On a positive note, they seem to be quality made and I believe better results might be achived on larger breeds.
customer_reviews.author: Tim S.

customer_reviews.title: Sorry not sorry
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed even the second time around. I measured my three dogs the first time around and ordered a large harness. Had to send it back because it was too small. It wouldn't reach around long enough to snap on both sides. So i returned it to get an xl. Its too big for all the dogs. The straps are too stiff to adjust so the dogs either trip over the cord because the vest hangs to low or they just walk right on out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Herrakane Danyele

customer_reviews.title: Not a great experience
customer_reviews.text: It's a cute harness, and easy to put on, but did nothing for the pulling, and rubbed into her armpits and caused sores :(
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Bish

customer_reviews.title: I like that there is a ring on the top for ...
customer_reviews.text: Durable and cute... I like that there is a ring on the top for the leash and then a separate ring on the bottom that I can hook the car seat attachment when I take my pup for a ride. The only reason it is not 5 stars is because when the side straps are tightened the extra hangs down and my dog can bite and chew on them
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hook

customer_reviews.title: Be carefeul with this
customer_reviews.text: Was trying to figure why my dog was being apprehensive about getting in the harness. When I looked under her the harness had rubbed the skin off right under her front legs where the straps are. Straps are way to course. Adjusting the straps didn't help.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Medium to Large
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Originally ordered a size medium, just based on purchases in the past, but ended up just too small. Excellent customer service and quick responses helped me get the right size in about a week! The large fits her just perfect. She is an almost 3 year old Aussie, but has a LOT of fluff, so I think the large really accommodates that. Ha! Wonderful quality and easy to use, LOVE that it has two lead clips. Even using the regular one on the back, she already pulls less with a new harness. Will definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Bizzell

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: We love this harness! I bought a medium for my lab corgi mix and it fits perfect. She unfortunately is dog aggressive and was slipping her collars on walks so I needed something to give me better control of her for training and to keep everyone safe. I'm happy I didn't go with a cheaper harness. This one is great quality and worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Best harness I've ever bought.
customer_reviews.text: I've bought many dog harnesses in my time. These are the best ones I've ever used. They are highly reflective, durable, and the straps don't slide loose between uses. Other harness I've bought need readjusted all the time to stay fitted to the dog. These also are able to bed hooked from the front which for me, is the easiest way to keep the dogs from pulling.
customer_reviews.author: ble

customer_reviews.title: does not have the annoying issues other brands have like slipping and getting larger
customer_reviews.text: fits well, does not have the annoying issues other brands have like slipping and getting larger. This product does not ride on the dogs shoulders, that is nice and much better than other brands. I also like the handle on the top. The only reason for 4 stars is that the Large is suppose to fit my Golden Ret, she is about 70 lb, but it is a little short from chest to back where it goes around her legs. I think the size up would be too large.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat Gardener

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. Hard to adjust
customer_reviews.text: I have a harness my dog has to put his feet through. I thought it would be easier to get one that snapped around his underarms. It was so difficult to adjust. Has 4 adjustments, not two on his original. I went on line and the owner of company was trying To show you how to adjust and he was having a difficult time! After 25 minutes I gave up but at least harnes was a bit big. I walked him and when I came in I realized the neck area moved and was tight around my dogs neck and almost had to cut off. Thankfully I got it off and in the garbage it went.
customer_reviews.author: llc

customer_reviews.title: Great harness
customer_reviews.text: I'm so glad I bought this harness. It is very easy to adjust, the buckles are completely on top of fabric so they won't irritate your dog, the loops on the top of the harness and at the chest are in great locations for connecting a leash, the make of the harness is of good quality and in no way seemed to be bothersome or irritating to my dog. I love the handle feature on top. I bought this harness for running/ walking with my dog and thought that in some situations the handle would be great if I had to drag my dog out of harm's way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: German Shepherd slips right out of it.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this harness. I loved the way it looked on my dog and the color was nice but I have a German Shepherd and she's very aggressive around others so I took her on a test wash out with this harness around my house. I'm glad I did. She saw another dog and tried to go after it. She jerked backwards quickly and ducked her head. She about slipped completely out of her harness even though I adjusted it tightly on her. Very scary.
customer_reviews.author: Tweetie

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, well worth cost.
customer_reviews.text: I hardly ever leave reviews, most things I purchase are just mediocre and simply serve their purpose. This harness though is the BEST I have ever purchased. Well worth the price, quality materials, excellent design. I use the front attach loop for walking my headstrong Boston Terrier puppy, and he walks so politely and our walks are such a joy instead of a sled dog race. This harness had an unexpected benefit as well, it seems to work to help with separation anxiety for him too. Perhaps because the design has more coverage? Either way, we love it, and he looks forward to putting on, coming forward and putting his head right in! Thanks for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality; Funny Fit
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little funny in size. I'd go a size up if you are questioning how to fit it. My doxie wear it but he's really in between the sizes they list. One is too small, one is too big!
customer_reviews.author: Wright at Home

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Harness!!  Best Harness Ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: It is a soft, adjustable, lightweight, sturdy no pull harness! I have a large yellow lab and this harness fits like a glove and it is strong! I love the nylon webbing with the reflective material. The two leash attachments work really well depending on whether we are walking or going from the house to the car. Tito loves it and stands perfectly still when I put it on. Also, the support staff and sellers are professional, communicate quickly, empathetic, and awesome!!! I will definitely buy from you again! THANK YOU!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren E.

customer_reviews.title: This is a good product I've tried many other ones including the easy ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product I've tried many other ones including the easy walk this one seems to stay pretty much where it supposed to stay and not twist around like the other ones do. Heavy duty I really didn't need one as heavy duty as this since my pup is only 11 pounds but it does what it supposed to do that's why I gave it a five star.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Will help a senior dog move around
customer_reviews.text: I bought this harness to help my 16 year old golden retriever move around easier. He can wear this harness all the time as his "collar". There is a handle on the top of the harness so I can grip it and help my dog walk. I previously purchased a sling that can go under the dog's belly with two handles on each end to help with walking but my dog was unhappy with the sling (he wouldn't budge) which is why I tried this harness. This will solve my problem. I ordered the size Large but needed to exchange it for an Extra Large. The seller was extremely helpful with the size problem.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: Super harness!
customer_reviews.text: This dog harness is GREAT! It is very substantial and, after you have all of the straps adjusted, it goes on easily. The handle on the top is a very useful feature and such a good idea. I highly recommend this harness regardless of the size of your dogs. We are using it for beagles, welch corgis and a Great Pyrenees. Recommended to me by a friend with an Australian shepherd.
customer_reviews.author: George Brown

customer_reviews.title: It works great, but has design flaws
customer_reviews.text: The harness is a great harness....once it is on. The problem with this harness is a design flaw. To fit securely the opening needs to (obviously) be small to keep the dog in the harness. The problem is that since a dogs head is bigger than it's neck, it's a tight fit to get over the dogs head. My dog really hates it, and backs away from the harness, even when she is excited to go on a walk. This could have been easily fixed if the fasteners were both on one side, instead of having both in the back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Jordan

customer_reviews.title: May not have gotten the right size.
customer_reviews.text: First, the harness is nice and very well made. I don't know if the size I purchased is not correct, but my dog get choked when she is pulling against the leash with the harness on. I have tightened and loosened the neck area and it happens regardless. When she is being stubborn and I try to get her to come along, it does not pull on any part of her neck. That is definitely a good thing. The underneath section between the neck and underarm is baggy. Again, I may have gotten the wrong size. I did follow the measurement guideline.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stinnett

customer_reviews.title: Runs small.
customer_reviews.text: Order a large based on the large stating it fits 27-32 inches. My dogs chest is 30 inches. She is a 50lbs pointer mix. The large adjusted out to the max wouldn't even buckle. Seems like a nice harness but runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyx4

customer_reviews.title: Buckle snapped on impact
customer_reviews.text: The sizing on this is great. We have a 9 month old great dane and she is maxing out of the large and moving into the XL. She did snap a buckle though. She was in harness on leash and jumped full speed ahead. When the leash tension brought her back to earth she landed all her weight on the side and broke that buckle. The other side stayed on and she was still somewhat secure. She's 100lbs. I think any plastic clasp would have broken under thar circumstance, but wanted to share our experience.
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: Finally a harness that works
customer_reviews.text: We had previously gone through 5 other harness that either broke or our dog chewed through. We have a 70 pound black lab/german shepherd mix. The harness is so easy to put on, and she willingly sticks her head through the hole now because she knows that means she gets to go outside. The harness is also comfy enough for her that she doesn't try to chew it up, and sometimes will have it on for hours. I like the handle on the back so we can hold her close if need be. I also feel she pulls less when I attach the leash to the front of the harness.
customer_reviews.author: Robin MS

customer_reviews.title: Nice, well made harness
customer_reviews.text: We decided to buy a larger dog this go around and since my wife is small in stature i figured this would help. She started taking him for evening walks and where he once would pull and tug with a regular collar he has responded very well using this harness. It also makes for a great harness to take him in the vehicles since we can secure him with the seat belts so he cannot get out a window. Needless to say my wife is happy because she can enjoy walking him and the dog is doing very well and seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Larson

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the expense.
customer_reviews.text: We have a Siberian Husky and this harness would not stay put when on a walk. It would pull almost half way side to side and it didnt feel secure. We thought it may be that it needed tightening so we did as tight as possible without it being too tight for our pup to breath comfortably and still had the issue. The front "no pull" ring felt small and cheap and the top ring was made of plastic, not metal. In our experience this was just way too soft and not secure. Also quite expensive. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for about a month now. It feels very durable and I love how it looks. Great colors. Using the attachment on the front doesn't quite work the way it is supposed to. When I put the leash on the front attachment and my dog pulls the whole harness shifts out of place to the side. This does still stop him from pulling, but not in the way it is supposed to. My dog does have an awkward body shape so that could be the reason. If your dog is a really strong puller I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable for my puppy to wear.
customer_reviews.text: Harness is stiff, and it quickly stretched out so it is now too big. So I now have to buy another. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: M J

customer_reviews.title: Pretty pretty good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice harness!! I like that it has the front clip so you can train them to not pull, if that's an issue. The color is awesome. I'm glad I splurged for this! It's sturdy and my 35 lb Corgi doesn't mind being in it at all. The size was perfect too. Very utilitarian and just what I need.
customer_reviews.author: Lucy F.

customer_reviews.title: Best Harness Out There!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we bought, not because the first one broke, but because my dog out grew it! These are the sturdiest dog harnesses I have ever used. They're easy to put on, easy to adjust, and built to last. We have puppies (that means teething) so any harness we got from PetCo didn't last more than a week or two. And we refuse to pay the ridiculous amount they want for the "Heavy Duty" kind. If you're looking for a very durable long lasting harness this is the way to go. You won't regret it. By the way it's super easy to wash as well!
customer_reviews.author: Sofian Sheikh

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very strong cute little jerk of a Corgi Brat. I've been trying to better his leash manners for all 5 years of his life... but learning is not his forte. I've tried numerous collars, harnesses and leashes and none have worked as well as this one. This is even better than the gentle leader for my guy! I'm impressed, hopefully it continues to work for us. As long as I hook his leash on the front hook by his chest it really does keep him from pulling. If/when he does try it turns his body and stops him in his tracks.
customer_reviews.author: Kelley B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and very comfortable feeling harness
customer_reviews.text: The product is very well made and more adjustable than I anticipated. It has a comfortable feel to the material and stitching that I'm sure our dog appreciates! He gets super excited when we get ready to put it on him where with the old harness we had he would do his best to avoid it. It seems to be sturdy and durable too and the no pull loop for the leash that's on the chest plate works great. It runs true to size of not a little bigger than expected. We purchased an XL for our large Goldendoodle and had to adjust it down a bit. I would recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Lia Renn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Design For Big Headed Pups
customer_reviews.text: We really wanted to like this harness, but it's just not designed for pup with large heads. Since there is no clip on the neck opening, you have to either try to force it on over and off of the dog or adjust it before and after putting it on. However, between the poor quality buckles and the stiffness of the straps, it is very difficult to adjust when on the dog especially if they are at all excited about having a harness put on.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Great for pitbulls
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 2 y/o Staffy/American pitbull mix and it's awesome. Great for car rides as the handle is big enough to loop a seat belt through and the clip for leash walking is very sturdy. My favorite part is the mesh elastic pouch on the front that you can put dog tags into- prevents jingle! The only reason for 4 stars is because he can slip himself out of it if he tries hard enough. He has to be pulling away from it (with head toward the leash holder) for that to happen. Other than that it's awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Size may run small
customer_reviews.text: The harness seem to be small for the sizes indicated from the advertisement. When the Dogwood stop, and I would pull slightly forward the Holter would pull to the top of the dog's head. I believe the size maybe a bit small. But with the advertisement we are not permitted to return it if it was on the dog. How else would you know if it would be correct. I would hesitate Pryor to ordering. After the review, the company was nice enough to rectify our problem. I respect their decision.
customer_reviews.author: William Bolt

customer_reviews.title: Very Well Made but a Little Heavy and Bulky for a Small Dog
customer_reviews.text: The harness is very well made. I have a 12 pound chihuahua, so I had to tighten up the neck straps beyond the little loops which worked well. I bought the small which fits her chest just fine. She has not been able to pull out of it yet because I have made it tight enough....only problem is that it is very heavy and bulky. I like the beefiness of it but my dog can't talk, so I don't know if she likes it, LOL. I will continue using it until she complains about the weight. I would say the harness is best for dogs over 15 pounds, other than that it is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Twilight

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value compared to other brands
customer_reviews.text: Comparing this harness to the one s I've purchased from pet stores makes me realize that I've been getting ripped off. This harness is double the quality of those regular ones from brands like Top Paw that have one buckle at the top, and the True Love harness is cheaper. My 11 month old Corgi has been enjoying this harness (medium), but if she gets any bigger I'll probably need to get a large. I had to loosen the straps all the way on her chest but it fits her well for now.
customer_reviews.author: Revelatus

customer_reviews.title: Dog chewed through it.
customer_reviews.text: I hate to give this a lower rating after so many great reviews but I have a little Jack Russel Terrier who chewed through this harness in literally 10 minutes. If anyone out there has suggestions I'd love them. I didn't even get to walk him with it. I fitted him for it, place him in his Kennel for 10 minutes while I quickly vacuumed. I took him out to go for his walk and ...BOOM... he chewed through it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Boynton

customer_reviews.title: Critical design flaw
customer_reviews.text: the reason why I chose this harness instead of other more popular brands like Puppia was because the neck and the body of the harness were supposed to be fully adjustable. however, there is a big problem that limits the adjustability. If you want to make the neck space smaller, you can only adjust it an inch or two because the thick metal component cannot pass through the small fabric loop. This is difficult to explain but can be seen in the photos attached. I wish I knew this item could be returned, unfortunately now my return window has passed.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Had high hopes and was let down.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the concept and idea of this harness (has great features, if they could be utilized) but couldn't quite get a proper fit on my dog at any size, Seems to press/crush into his sternum at sizes up and down. He is a Yorkie for reference.
customer_reviews.author: Docgogo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Harness
customer_reviews.text: My black lab is a wiggle worm and a big puller. This has taken care of the problem. It's easy to put on. He knows now that he has to sit still for two snaps, then off we go! Pulling is at a minimum, which is good because I have two other dogs, and one is a slow poke, so this brings us closer to all walking at the same speed. I did a lot of research before buying, compared a lot of customer reviews, ordered a few misses myself, but this is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette G.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Harness/Well made
customer_reviews.text: Well made harness! The adjustable straps makes it easy to custom fit it to your dog/puppy. When adjusted properly, my puppy cannot walk out of it! It doesn’t pull or pinch in the armpits. I bought this in a small for my 9 week old Aussie. He weighs 12 pounds and staulky built. He will out grow it in no time though. I should have bought a medium.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit my Dobie
customer_reviews.text: Bought the size according to measurements but my Dobie has such a deep chest that it just doesn't fit her right. Am at the end of the adjustments and still can't get a good fit. Very disappointed. She doesn't like the strap around her nose so I wanted something that would still stop the pulling, but would be less of an irritant for her. Unfortunately this is not the answer for me.
customer_reviews.author: icstorm

customer_reviews.title: it was a perfect fit for my yellow lab (XL) and pug mix ...
customer_reviews.text: I just received this harness tonight. It was difficult for me to figure out how to loosen the chest straps, but once I did, it was a perfect fit for my yellow lab (XL) and pug mix (M). They seem to be of high quality and I love the way they sit on their bodies. My yellow lab has sensitive skin and her last harness rubbed on her armpits, causing red, swollen sores. This harness does not sit even close to her armpits for that to happen. Knock on wood that once she gets moving, it stays that way! (I will update my review once I start taking her out for walks)
customer_reviews.author: Amy Holladay

customer_reviews.title: This is the BEST harness! My dog weighs 87lbs
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST harness! My dog weighs 87lbs, and is a lab/rott mix. The XL fit her perfectly. This goes on easy, and the handle is wonderful for extra control.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Pulido

customer_reviews.title: This harness doesn't feel like it's extra tough
customer_reviews.text: A harness that doesn't chafe, woohoo! I got this for my foster dog who is the one of the tallest labs I've met. He's not at all overweight, but just so big. The largest size barely fits around the belly, but fully extended it does. The neck has lots of room. It doesn't chafe under his front legs which is what I was hoping for. He is not a well bred lab and has a thin, sensitive coat prone to chafe. This harness doesn't feel like it's extra tough, and I don't think it would hold up to any chewing, but it did hold up when he saw a squirrel and pulled with all 108 lbs of his weight!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah E

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have only had it 3 months without frequent or heavy use and a clasp broke making it useless.
customer_reviews.author: Ave's mom

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat of a hassle
customer_reviews.text: This harness has reflective qualities, which are great for safety. The handle on the back is nice for holding on to when a little more security than a leash is needed for your dog, although it is a little small to grip. Putting the harness on is somewhat of a hassle. I had to remove my dog's regular collar every time, before slipping the harness over his head and then securing the clasps. My dog is quite well behaved and tolerates this, but he much prefers his other harness without a small head hole and 2 clasps being done and undone every time.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey Boulter

customer_reviews.title: This harness works great if you clip on the hook on the back ...
customer_reviews.text: This harness works great if you clip on the hook on the back and we use it often that way. However, I bought it to help with leash training to use with the front hook. It does turn her around when she starts to pull, but because of the way its built, she can't walk when I have the leash hooked on the front. It shifts the harness and trips her up every few steps. So it doesn't do what I needed it to do and I'm bummed!
customer_reviews.author: Joleigh Little

customer_reviews.title: Go up a size
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the fusia harness in an XS for an 8 week old lab puppy. Her measurements indicated this would work at least for now. That was not the case. I could hardly get it over her head when fully extended and then the neck was too loose. I extended the chest straps as far as they would go and it was still tight. Go up a size. Do I think this harness will work for her in a bigger size when she is full grown? No. It isn’ that sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: K. Garber

customer_reviews.title: Front leash attachments stops my dog from pulling.
customer_reviews.text: I have a 10 lb dachshund and finally found the front leash attachment used to train her from pulling when walking her that actually fit. I had to pull straps to the smallest settings to get it to fit. After using two times, she stopped pulling while walking. I use the top attachment most of the time now. I have had to use front attachment when walking around other dogs or when grandchildren are with me.
customer_reviews.author: deb

customer_reviews.title: Run small
customer_reviews.text: These run small so order a size up. I had to return the Larges I bought for my Boxers. According to the size chart they should have fit, I adjusted as big as it would go, it wasn’t close to being able to close the clasp.
customer_reviews.author: B. Vanderveen

customer_reviews.title: It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s arrived so fast! It’s safe, stylist, so bright at night that was a new one for me, my dog Mia loves it and it allows me to have better control of her! This was the best price I could find and I loved the fact that they had so many colors to chose from
customer_reviews.author: Veronica G Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great Investment, Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: This fits perfectly for our 98 pound German Shepard and of course we had to purchase the XL size and wow it fits the fatty. With having the reflective included in the harness allows me to see him running in the back of the house during the nighttime. I love having the additional tug loop on top to pull him back when he is not acting properly and the material is very sturdy and don't feel like it will tear. Totally recommend this to anybody!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No adjusting info included
customer_reviews.text: I am having some difficulty adjusting this xs to fit more comfortably on my 10# Shihtzu/Bichon. I just got it today and it appears to be well made but I would have appreciated some info on adjusting the straps to loosen the area under her throat/upper chest area. It seems rather stiff in that area and it is not easy to loosen the straps. It seems to be the right size if I can adjust it.
customer_reviews.author: Karjac

customer_reviews.title: My dogs are short and the front lead option doesn't ...
customer_reviews.text: My dogs are short and the front lead option doesn't work. they just step over the lead. Also when using the back lead, if they pull it chokes them. I would advise this for only tall dogs.
customer_reviews.author: J. Schlosser

customer_reviews.title: Pretty + Functionality...you can’t beat the quality
customer_reviews.text: All set!! This is K’s 2nd Truelove harness, but sized down this time to a large. Unfortunately our 1st harness was stolen. I needed another especially for security in the car. Projectile casualties are too common and a bunch of states don’t require any securing of your pet. Please buy this harness & you’re all good!! Breed - Siberian Husky Weight - 55lbs Chest - 29-30” Neck - 19” Size - large with adjustment room on both neck/chest This was the ABSOLUTE best quality & price. I hope this helps some puppers stay safe & enjoy the ride!
customer_reviews.author: Barbs87

customer_reviews.title: Super pleased!
customer_reviews.text: I love this harness for my pups! The only reason I deduct a star is because it does loosen a bit quickly after a run/walk, but that is also largely due to the fact the my stubborn animals are way too excited and have little impulse control, so they pull a lot on our outdoor endeavors. I love the reflectivity, the fit, and the comfort that it provides on their belly and around their legs. I'd buy 2 more if the product were a bit less expensive.
customer_reviews.author: yanelle

customer_reviews.title: Can Walk Dog with Confidence
customer_reviews.text: Broke my arm walking my son's dog (long story, fractured humerus). Obviously he can really pull on a leash, very strong and not quite 2 years old. This harness works!!!!!! Walked him multiple times yesterday without any worry of him pulling me. Was a little disappointed that this harness didn't come with the double leash but fastened his single leash to front ring and as soon as he got too far ahead of me and was pulled sideways he stopped. A little difficulty adjusting the straps but once they were the right length, the harness went on without problems. He even seems to like it! Great purchase. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: zebra1201

customer_reviews.title: Durability
customer_reviews.text: Great harness. My dog has a long body and is thin around his waist. I got a medium. The harness is let out as far as it can go and it fits him, but barely. I wish I would have ordered a large. I know he can not get out of this which was my goal. He slipped out of a collar one day when I was walking him. No slippage here.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: XL is Perfect for my 95lb Rottweiler!
customer_reviews.text: Looks ( & I can tell it feels better than her old harness) on my female Rottie. I got the purple XL, and she still has room. Easy to slip on and off. She is a known puller and that has eased off quite a bit with this harness. It does reflect, fits her comfortably, nice handle on the back for close control, very deep purple to match her collar & tag. Beautiful, well designed. Would definitely buy again. I am ordering a pink one for our Doxie! Will update if I have any issues. 💜💗
customer_reviews.author: Chaney's

customer_reviews.title: More Adjustable Than Others
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a mix of many things and a very "funny" shape. He isn't very big but he is very long, his neck is small but his ribs are wider than you would expect. I love that I can easily adjust this harness and there is more "room" available around the ribs that the typical "small/medium" dog would need. The purple color is nice and gender neutral, and bright enough it doesn't blend in with his fur but not so much that it's obnoxious.
customer_reviews.author: Kerri

customer_reviews.title: Great harness, no stress on neck and easy on & off.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made, easy to use harness. Our dog sustained a severe back injury and had surgery. We had to immobilize him for several months. When we were able to walk him again it was important that he was didn’t pull against a neck collar leash or contort his back. This was an excellent choice for a harness! He gets very excited at walk time and won’t stand still long but the design of this harness is great. It slips on fast and you’re off! The leash attachment has several options which is very helpful. It is easy to clean and made extremely well. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: june

customer_reviews.title: Corgi Harness
customer_reviews.text: Got size small for my 2 mo corgi. I had to tighten it down all the way and it barely fits. But it works and he will have plenty of room to grow into it. I love the handle on the back and how it is fully adjustable. My dog doesn't mind putting it on, it's super fast after the first fitting, and I can clip easily clip him into the seat belt in the car.
customer_reviews.author: Baughley

customer_reviews.title: Love this harness and leash!
customer_reviews.text: The hot pink makes it fashionable still for my little princess, but the thickness and sturdiness of the material makes me feel comfortable that she isn't going to slip out of my grasp. I purchased a hot pink harness for her as well and all though they weren't sold together, they look perfect together. I love switching to the harness rather than the collar when walking her as she isn't very collar happy and was always pulling against it despite continued training. The harness makes me happy that I'm not choking her! Very pleased with this harness plus the leash combo purchase!
customer_reviews.author: A Tack

customer_reviews.title: Durability Plus Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the best dog harness I have found and I have been through a lot of them over the past 40 yrs. It is very durable and hugs my dog very comfortably. Plus it is easy to get on/off. I did the measurements as directed, but the first one I ordered I had to send back as the fit was too snug even when I adjusted the extensions. I liked it so much I reordered it in the next size and it fit perfectly. I like the top grab handle and color choices, but best of all is the way it is made. Very sturdy. I would recommend this harness to others.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Looks great too.
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting harness and super easy to put on. It looks really good on my dogs and is a high quality product. The only thing I would make differently if given the option are the adjustable straps around the chest. If you have a smaller dog and adjust the size down, the straps are hanging a bit at the arms. It would be nice if there was a loop on the strap to put the excess into, so that the dogs arms don't hit it as they walk. Not a huge deal, and my dogs are medium size so there isn't too much excess, but it would be a nicer finish if the excess straps were held up.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Fit is great for our 100lb German Shepard
customer_reviews.text: Fit is great for our 100lb German Shepard. Easy to put on and adjust, handle is strong enough . Description is accurate. Harness is soft and flexible, doesn't bother dog at all. Very pleased with this harness, tried to avoid using any harness but we found we did need a bit more control of the dog since he's still a puppy .
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for training a puppy
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this after seeing one on another dog while walking our puppy. The owner was happy to recommend it and told us all the info we needed to order it. We’ve had it for a week and are very pleased with it. We training our puppy to walk on a leash and just a dog collar wasn’t working well. This is comfortable for her and is somewhat easy to put on. I would prefer if the strap that goes around the neck had a clip like I saw on the video but maybe that is for a different size than we purchased.
customer_reviews.author: Dave376

customer_reviews.title: Best
customer_reviews.text: This is a really well made harness! Price is good, seller has been awesome. Shipped quickly. I have a 5mo golden retriever and needed the chest ring to work on his ability to walk with me. Golden retrievers are very smart and friendly but busy goof-balls. As dogs feel more comfortable with things they know are theirs, it is good to have a harness that is going to last! I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Very strong, great looks, well made.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to keep my strong willed pooch under control while walking, It works, but not as well as others I have. When the leash is attached to the front of the harness, it has a tendency to move or slide more than it should to control her forward motion. If I tighten it enough to prevent it from sliding, it won't fit over her head, It is very well made and seems to be a comfortable fit, and the reflectivity is good when walking at night. Maybe my dog needs therapy to control her pulling?
customer_reviews.author: Major Blunders

customer_reviews.title: Ten stars!
customer_reviews.text: I've bought four of these now for various dogs in my life. I'd give it ten stars if I could. They are adjustable to any dog and fit well. The design where you don't have to put the dog's legs through the holes is great, and the clips being on the top of the dog is ingenious. Dogs don't get tangled in the leash and it works great for dogs who pull. Wonderful product and well worth the few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Quality is good, but not so sure about the design.
customer_reviews.text: So this is a tough review, i really dont love this product. The quality is great. seems pretty strong and over a nice quality product, construction wise. But i just cant get this to fit my dog properly. for some reason it just doesn't sit right on him. if i tighten it, if i loosen it, he doesnt look comfortable and twice he has easily escaped it. He is a 75 lb golden doodle so its not like i am pulling cujo over here. not sure about this product design. something about it seems wrong to me.
customer_reviews.author: S.C.P.

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed... Inferior product.
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this harness. I bought 2 - a small and a medium - for my 18 lb Boston and 22 lb Pug x Boston. Neither one worked for either dog. The small was just too small and that is the size I normally get for the Boston. The medium was too small fo4 the Pug x Boston mix. So, tried the medium on the Boston and I can adjust it to fit, but it doesn’t stay... by the end of a walk she can get right out of it! Bad product! I would suggest Rough Wear Harness as I have previously bought and they have lasted for years.
customer_reviews.author: Tami Fahey

customer_reviews.title: My favortie harness by far!
customer_reviews.text: We use this brand for both my dogs and have suggested it to friends as well. We feel like it has good security, however, if the dog tries to back out of it and you keep the leash tight, the dog can slip it. It's tough and durable and easy to wipe down after hiking or swimming. We use them daily for walks and they are still going strong. We also like that you can adjust the harness if the dog sheds a lot and body size changes (we have a rough collie who blows her coat three times a year).
customer_reviews.author: Amanda L. Blackburn

customer_reviews.title: Good harness for growing puppy
customer_reviews.text: I got the teal-blue harness. It’s very easy to use with my growing puppy. I had a different harness for her that I bought at a local store and it’s been a fight to put her in that harness. She was very cooperative with me putting the JUXH harness on her that I ordered. It’s going to be beneficial to be able to use a leash on the front ring on the harness, and use the handle to help me with her training. The medium was a little tight, but JUXZH was very helpful in getting a large size for my growing puppy and quick to respond to my inquiry.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Bright and pretty!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 75 lb lab and so I have been looking for a harness for her to wear so she doesn't choke herself like she does with a regular collar. Anyone knows with a rather large pup, harnesses can get pretty expensive. However, I am so glad I found this. It fits her perfectly, just had to be tightened some. I ordered it in the pink, and the color is very bright. I would recommend to anyone who is needed a harness for their fur baby!
customer_reviews.author: Shana Klutz

customer_reviews.title: Buy this if you have an energetic dog who tends to pull on the leash!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1 year old me Akita who PULLs on his regular leash like a madman. I read somewhere online that harnesses tend to help with the tugging and they were right! Putting the harness on my dog for the first time was interesting (he’s so squirmy and wants to bite everything) however once it was on him, he walked like a dream with minimal tugging. The harness itself is sturdy and seems to be comfortable on him. I recommend a harness like this to anyone who has a energetic pup.
customer_reviews.author: Karina

customer_reviews.title: it works great for no pulling and t does adjust around her ...
customer_reviews.text: Unless I’m mistaken and just can’t figure it out, It is not adjustable to fit around head and neck. It just either fits or it doesn’t. Our boxer has to squeeze her head through it. Otherwise, it works great for no pulling and t does adjust around her body. Will probably have to order the next size up unfortunately because it’s almost too small for her head to go through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, great customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The harness is very sturdy and very easy to put on. My dog gets super excited about walks and we had no issues getting it on him (as you can see in the video, he doesn’t mind wearing it at all!). I like that it has two places to hook the leash, because sometimes my dog can escape harnesses when the leash is hooked to the front. I also love that it has reflectors on it, especially in these winter months when it gets dark out so early. The company was great about answering my questions and helping me get the right size too!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Besides that's it's a great harness. 65 pound dog bought a
customer_reviews.text: This works really well from the back clip for my pointer but the front clip dosent work as well. With the frount clip the whole harness moves and ends up rubbing his fur off. Besides that's it's a great harness. 65 pound dog bought a large
customer_reviews.author: sdvigna

customer_reviews.title: Front Ring is Great But...
customer_reviews.text: The reason I got this harness is because of the front ring where you attach the leash. It is great for training & for dogs that want to run ahead of you. Unfortunately, The sides have a stretchy material so if the dog jumps or moves a certain way, it can widen enough to get out of it. I don't dare use it without clipping it to my dog's collar with a coupler or carabiner. At least that way, I have the collar as a back up. I wish they would get rid of the stretchy material.
customer_reviews.author: bdx

customer_reviews.title: our 11 week puppy is now easily manageable
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for controlling your puppy. We put it on our puppy whenever we leave the house. I love the handle and the loops for easy attachment of seat belt harness and/or leash. No complaints from the puppy when he gets picked up by the handle or to put it on. If he is bored, he tries to chow on it but it hasn't shown any signs of wear or distress after a week of everyday use. It seems to be made very well with cushion and stitched piping in the right places and steardy straps. Our small size harness weighs 5.8 oz.
customer_reviews.author: Ramin A.

customer_reviews.title: I love this (extra-large) harness for my 75lb yellow lab
customer_reviews.text: I love this (extra-large) harness for my 75lb yellow lab. It gives me complete control when she has her stubborn moments on the walk. Easy to redirect her. Could never do that with a collar.I originally tried a step-in harness for her, which I liked because it was lighter than this one, but with her sensitive paws, it was stressful for her to get into. I originally tried a Large, but had to return for an X-Large. Perfect. This harness is stress-free for Tasha. She's happy. I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Kate H.

customer_reviews.title: Nice harness but too big for my lil guy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 6lb chihuahua, followed the chart and got the XS but it was too big. The only way to have the harness securely on him is to shorten around the neck area but after doing that, it was extremely hard to get it off and he hated it. Would’ve helped if there was a third buckle around the neck. This harness was extremely well made and I loved the teal color but we ended up returning it and getting another brand with the third buckle. I would definitely recommend this for bigger dogs - 8lb and above.
customer_reviews.author: Ivonne

customer_reviews.title: Heavy Duty
customer_reviews.text: This harness is heavy duty, almost too much for my russell terrier, its padded nicely and has heavy duty adjustable buckles. My dog doesn't care for harnesses that she has to put her head through, mainly when removing and has to scrape her ears. This harness pulls more on front of chest, so the head opening can remain bigger. Its balanced nicely when on, the large loop on the back, I could pick her off the ground and she didn't mind, the padding is thick. I am pleased with this purchase. Its heavy duty will work great for large dogs.
customer_reviews.author: R. Lehn

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy design and bright colors make us feel safer
customer_reviews.text: Our dog seems to like it as well. This replaced an earlier harness that chafed our dog under the armpits - yes, he's not that well behaved and pulls at the leash occasionally. With this harness, the force is on his neck and mid-section and keeps the strain balanced which is okay for us. He seems happy with the new harness and I feel safer with the sturdy design. I will be curious to see how the plastic loop will hold up over time - i might have made that metal instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cord

customer_reviews.title: Really nice and strong
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and it’s very sturdy. I just can’t seem to get the perfect fit. When I attach the leash to the front hook, it twists on my dogs body. It does slow her down and she doesn’t pull as hard, but I don’t think I can tighten it anymore and it certainly doesn’t stay straight. I gave it a 4 because I really like the concept, its well made and I get a lot of compliments on it. I’m hoping I’ll grt the fit just right and if I do, it would deserve a five.
customer_reviews.author: S. A. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this exact harness 3x! Love it we have two dogs and 10 harness later this is the one. Dont waste $ on any other kind. the only reason I bought a 3rd was my dog ate the clip off hers one day while i was at work. she pulled it from the table and she thought it was a chew toy. Which speaks more about her chewing than the harness. It is incredibly durable! And comfy she doesnt try to wiggle out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Crissy K.

customer_reviews.title: NOT SAFE
customer_reviews.text: My 57# boodle English bull dog standard poodle mix slips right out of it, I think it is the elastic strap that stretches when she pulls on it, What a waste of $27.00. Have to keep it until I can get a safer harness, as this is the only one I have right now. I guess it is better than nothing, just have to watch her so she doesn't pull out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Wildwoman

customer_reviews.title: Wish the neck had a buckle instead.
customer_reviews.text: The harness can only be unbuckled on the torso portion, not the neck area. So it's cumbersome to have to pull the harness over my dogs head every time we go for a walk. The neck portion is adjustable but not stretchy or easy to adjust. It's a snug tug every time I pull it on or off my dogs ears. The plastic loops on the front chest area and the top back area are great options to have. You can clip your leash to either, to control how you lead.
customer_reviews.author: RD

customer_reviews.title: However I would recommend this product for someone with a less muscular dog
customer_reviews.text: Well made and well worth the price. Unfortunately for my bull terrier it did not fit well. The straps rubbed under his front legs. However I would recommend this product for someone with a less muscular dog. I thought it was a good product, I just had the wrong dog for it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S

customer_reviews.title: Does not work well as a front harness
customer_reviews.text: Updated to 4 stars because of quick and friendly customer service. It’s a sturdy harness but the front harness does not work well which is the reason I bought this harness. When it’s clipped in the front the leash ends up cutting into one of her legs making it difficult for her to walk normal but doesn’t stop her from pulling. Also it’s difficult to get off and on. I’ll be buying a different harness style.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Durable, and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: My mom's lab puppy is nearly full grown and she seems to walk better with a harness, but she is too big for the one we have used for the last few months. I decided to get her this for an early Christmas present and it has worked out great so far! It fits her great and looks even better! I have the same harness in black for my own dog and it has lasted years so I know this one will last a long time assuming she doesn't outgrow it! I get comments and questions all the time asking where I got this harness and am always happy to share I got it here!
customer_reviews.author: Crazy Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Really great harness
customer_reviews.text: I went to all of the usual pet stores and there were no good harnesses with this level of adjustability. Fantastic for medium breed dogs in the 3-5 month range that grow quickly. they are comfortable and versatile. Great for hard to fit dogs (Bull breed owners, this is for you). I bought a second just in case #1 wears out and these are not available anymore.
customer_reviews.author: anders hudson

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for escape artists with fat necks
customer_reviews.text: I have a pug, and I can only walk him on his harness. Because of the shape of his body it is ordinarily easy for him to sleep right out of it when he pulls backwards, so I always had to play really close attention while walking him. This is the first harness I have purchased that he cannot slip out of, and it appears to he high quality material. I won't be buying any other harnesses in the future.
customer_reviews.author: devryn

product_meta.title: juxzh Truelove Soft Front Dog Harness .Best Reflective No Pull Harness with Handle and 2 Leash Attachments
feature_bullets: Color: Fuchsia Size XS Fits chest 13-17inches,Stylish ,Durable, Scratch-Resistant Oxford material outer layer,lightweight Draflex Buckle with large loading capacity which greatly improves tensile strength.Comfortable and ergonomi design ensures easy to fit and put on/take off.

safety your cfeatures include Nylon webbing with 3M reflective material for Good visibility at night and Sturdy handle for easy seat belt attachment while riding in your car.reflective Nylon webbing ensure good visibility for this high-end Dog Harness.
Comfortable lightweight Mesh lining with soft sponge padding in chest and belly.Dog Harness Vest do the best to  prevent the dog injuries than a collar.
Two leash attachment points: A v-ring on the dog's back and circle ring on the dog's chest.

Please refer to the size chart image for correct item dimensions.measure your dog's chest with a tape, at whatever point gives the widest circumference of front chest. Be sure to set aside 0.7-1.1 inches(2-3cm).
